definition: bus or tram stop/intermediate stop (on route of ship, plane etc)/port of call/stopover
to stop/to halt/to park (a car)
to lean against or on/to stand by the side of/to come near to/to depend on/to trust/to fuck (vulgar)/traditional military costume drama where the performers wear armor (old)
station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

sentences.english: The next stop is much further on.
sentences.chinese: 下一个停靠站离这里很远。

sentences.english: Could you take my bags to the Taxi Stand, please?
sentences.chinese: 方便把我的行李放到出租车停靠站吗？

sentences.english: Stops along the route are candidates for new high-density housing, she says.
sentences.chinese: 轻轨沿线的停靠站将会是新建的高密度住宅区。

sentences.english: I shaved before I came to the bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 在到达停靠站之前我刮了胡须。

sentences.english: I'll eet you at the library bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 我将在图书馆汽车停靠站见面。

sentences.english: I shaved until I came to the bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 我刮胡须一直刮到我到达停靠站。

sentences.english: A:Is there a taxi stand nearby?
sentences.chinese: 这附近有没有了租车停靠站？

sentences.english: The express train goes straight to Dorsett without stopping.
sentences.chinese: 快车会直达多塞特，中途不停靠站。

sentences.english: Is there a taxi stand near here?
sentences.chinese: 这附近有出租车停靠站吗？

sentences.english: With its running line remains unchanged, but the dwelling stations increased or reduced.
sentences.chinese: 列车的开行线路没变，只是增加或者减少了停靠站。

sentences.english: On the other hand, it solves the work position resource graded access control.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面解决了停靠站中资源的分层次访问控制问题。

sentences.english: Trains model VAL256 stopped at a station.
sentences.chinese: 停靠站内的木栅线VAL256型胶轮捷运列车。
